text: @realDonaldTrump @realdonaldtrump just one more attempt for DOTUS Trump to play the tough guy (who can' walk down SLIGHTLY inclined ramps or hold a glass of water) & whose REAL purpose to set up a smokescreen to distract people from CONTINUING (despite his claims of "dying out") Covid19 DISASTER!
